title: Secrets in Silver Lakes
description: In this Dateline classic, when a young father is murdered at work, the investigation uncovers deep secrets about sex, friendship, religion and family. Josh Mankiewicz reports. Originally aired on NBC on November 3, 2017.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
